## ğŸ’¬ Community Support

For general questions, "how to" discussions, and connecting with other users, please join our Discord server:

[![Discord](https://img.shields.io/badge/Discord-Join%20Us-7289da?style=for-the-badge&logo=discord&logoColor=white)](https://discord.gg/TGjCmzHR)

## ğŸ› Bug Reports

If you've found a bug, please check the [Issues](https://github.com/Spieler1ONE1/SCCharacters/issues) to see if it's already been reported. If not, open a new issue using the **Bug Report** template.

## ğŸ’¡ Feature Requests

Have an idea for a new feature? We'd love to hear it! Please check existing [feature requests](https://github.com/Spieler1ONE1/SCCharacters/issues) first, and if your idea is unique, submit a new issue using the **Feature Request** template.
